roles.title: Business Systems Analyst
roles.pitch: I like working at the intersection of technical systems and business needs. I've built Power BI dashboards with role-based views, led Agile teams through sprint planning and CI/CD setup, and automated reporting workflows with Power Automate. I'm looking to bring that same mix of analytical thinking and cross-functional collaboration to BMO as a Business Systems Analyst.

genericPitch: I build full-stack applications and data-driven solutions backed by real metrics. Whether it's Go backends, Power BI dashboards, leading dev teams, or shipping under 24-hour hackathon deadlines, I focus on technical depth, fast learning, and getting things out the door.

highlights.label: Data Analysis & KPI Reporting
highlights.problem: Operations teams had no centralized view of asset integrity KPIs, so prioritizing inspections and catching compliance gaps was mostly guesswork
highlights.built: Power BI dashboard with DAX measures, role-based views for engineers vs. managers, slicers by department/month/year, and compliance trend summaries for stakeholder reporting
highlights.tech: Power BI, DAX, Power Query, SQL Server, SharePoint
highlights.impact: 24 months of data modeled, backlog alerts enabled proactive planning, role-based access tailored insights per audience

highlights.label: Business Requirements & Stakeholder Coordination
highlights.problem: A financial literacy platform needed someone to own front-end architecture and sort out API contracts between the front-end and back-end teams
highlights.built: Led requirements gathering through 2-3 Scrum meetings per week, defined API contracts with the back-end team, and built a shared React component library adopted across 5+ core pages
highlights.tech: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, GitHub Actions
highlights.impact: Accelerated feature delivery by 1-2 sprints, 30+ successful PR merges, piloted with 100+ students across 2-3 schools

highlights.label: Process Improvement & Automation
highlights.problem: Operational teams were manually reviewing time-series data with no automated way to flag anomalies or share forecasts
highlights.built: Analytics dashboard with ETS forecasting and rolling-origin backtesting, plus a Power Automate workflow that auto-generates and emails summary reports on a schedule
highlights.tech: Python, Streamlit, statsmodels, Plotly, Power Automate
highlights.impact: 45% lower MAE vs baseline, automated email distribution replaced manual reporting, metrics pipeline with near-zero handling for stability

highlights.label: Agile Delivery & Team Leadership
highlights.problem: Co-founded a dev studio and needed to set up structured delivery practices to ship reliable products for university clubs
highlights.built: Led 4 developers through Agile sprints with Git-based code reviews, shipped login systems, dashboards, and responsive UIs, and wrote onboarding docs for new contributors
highlights.impact: 100+ active users served, clean deployment pipeline, documentation enabled faster onboarding for new contributors

highlights.label: Systems Thinking & Enterprise Security
highlights.problem: Web apps serving 1,000+ daily users needed tighter security without breaking anything for active users
highlights.built: Set up CORS policies, proxy configs, role-based access control, and SQL auth. Also documented workflows and SOPs for the team
highlights.impact: Zero security incidents during tenure, resolved 3 critical system bottlenecks, all deadlines met ahead of schedule
